description:
Keep your backpack organized without adding excessive weight. The ultralight stuff sacks in this 3-pack have a slippery exterior to help you shove them into small nooks in your pack. The lightweight fabric has a waterproof coating to shed rain, but there are no taped seams or roll-top closure so it's not fully waterproof.

  • Silicone-impregnated ripstop Cordura® has 2000mm water-resistance
  • Cord lock top closure
  • Double-stitched seams and bartacked stress points add extra strength
  • Bottom handle for easy carrying
  • Includes 3 sacks: 2.5L, 4L, and 6.5L
name: Sea To Summit Ultra-Sil Stuff Sack Set
